Projects

I specialize in building complex web applications with advanced UI flows and data presentation, such as business software, admin dashboards, user portals, etc.

Cachefly CDN - User Portal

Cachefly is one of the leading CDN provider with more than 50 locations and high-performing, reliable content delivery.

The scope of this project was to design a responsive User Portal, where users can configure their CDN services and monitor the performance.

UX DESIGN UI DESIGN DASHBOARD DESIGN USER PORTAL DATA VISUALIZATION HTML CSS RESPONSIVE WEB APP

www.cachefly.com

Workzone - Project Management Software

Workzone is a project management software perfected through 20 years of user feedback, with a suite of carefully chosen features that makes it easy for everyone to use.

The interface needed a thorough redesign to catch up with the latest trends and be able to acquire new customers.

UX DESIGN UI DESIGN DASHBOARD DESIGN DATA-RICH UI DATA VISUALIZATION HTML CSS

www.workzone.com

Farmicon - Local Food Software

Farmicon was my personal project, where I was a Product Owner and Designer.

I was leading the design process from the first idea until it's final implementation.

PRODUCT DESIGN UX RESEARCH UX DESIGN UI DESIGN USER PORTAL HTML CSS RESPONSIVE WEB APP

Airline Operations Analytics Software

The software is used for monitoring various parameters that influence the daily operation of an airline, tracking weather conditions; live-monitoring flight arrivals and departures, gate and manpower utilization on individual airports; and, in case of any irregularities, suggesting the optimal flight rescheduling plan to minimize damage.

UX DESIGN UI DESIGN DASHBOARD DESIGN DATA VISUALIZATION
